name: 鄭鈺潔
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
1~ 3 week  Chapter 21-23 : Intro. to Electricity
4~ 5 week  Chapter 24-25 : Electric Potential and Capacitance
6~ 8 week  Chapter 28-30 : Intro. to Magnetism
9~ 10 week Midterm project
11~13 week  Chapter 31-33 : Intro. to Electromagnetic Wave
14~16 week Chapter 34-36 : Intro. to modern physics
17~18  week FINAL EXAM
scorePolicy:
In-class Quiz 28 points
2 points/week x 14 weeks = 28 points
Midterm Case Study 32 points
A subject self-defined
(Creativity 30% + Preparation 20% + Discussion 30% + Delivery 20%)	
Final exam 40 points
In-class Exam with 10 Exercises  50% (2 hours)
Case study 50% (1 hour preparation + 1 hour presentation)
Participation 10 points
-1 point / absence

Total 110 points
materials: Fundamentals of Physics by David Halliday
